sen.j: 北山通（きたやまどおり）は京都市の主要な東西の通りのひとつ、東西方向の幹線道路としては最北に位置している。
sen.e: The Kitayama-dori Street is one of the major east-west running streets of Kyoto City and located most northern among its east-west arterial highways.
The Kitayama-dori Street is one of the major east-west running streets in Kyoto City and located at the northern most portion among its east-west arterial highways.
The Kitayama-dori Street is one of the major east-west running streets in Kyoto City and located at the northern most portion among its east-west arterial highways.

sen.j: 東は白川通から、西は南に曲がってそのまま千本通に直結する。
sen.e: In the east, it extends from Shirakawa-dori Street; in the west, it bends southward to lead directly to the Sembon-dori Street.
In the east, it extends from Shirakawa-dori Street; in the west, it bends southward to lead directly to Sembon-dori Street.
In the east, it extends from Shirakawa-dori Street; in the west, it bends southward to lead directly to Senbon-dori Street.

sen.j: 戦前の都市計画により建設が開始され、1985年に全線開通した比較的新しい通りである。
sen.e: It is a relatively new road, which started to be built under a city plan before war and opened completely in 1985.
It is a relatively new road, which started to be built under a city plan before the war and opened completely in 1985.
It is a relatively new road, which started to be built under a city plan before the war and opened completely in 1985.

sen.j: 京都市営地下鉄北山駅 (京都府)付近、松ヶ崎通から北山大橋にかけて、現代建築に入居する飲食店や商店などが並び、伝統的な町並の京都市中心部と対照的な景観をなす。
sen.e: The street around Kitayama Station (Kyoto Prefecture) of Kyoto Municipal Subway/Kyoto City Subway and from the Matsugasaki-dori Street to the Kitayama-ohashi Bridge is lined with restaurants and shops housed in modern buildings, exhibiting a contrast to the downtown of Kyoto City that presents traditional appearances.

The street around Kitayama Station (Kyoto Prefecture) of Kyoto Municipal Subway/Kyoto City Subway and from Matsugasaki-dori Street to Kitayama-ohashi Bridge is lined with restaurants and shops housed in modern buildings, which is in contrast with the traditional appearance of Kyoto City.

The street around Kitayama Station (Kyoto Prefecture) of Kyoto Municipal Subway/Kyoto City Subway and from Matsugasaki-dori Street to Kitayama-ohashi Bridge is lined with restaurants and shops housed in modern buildings, which is in contrast with the traditional appearance of Kyoto City.

sen.j: 松ヶ崎橋西入から宝ヶ池通交差点付近までは、一筋北の旧道沿いに旧松ヶ崎村の集落が東西に伸びる。
sen.e: A community of former Matsugasaki-mura extends east-west along an old street located one block north between the Matsugasaki-bashi Nishi Iru (to the west of Matsugasaki-bashi) and the surrounding of the crossing with the Takaragaike-dori Street.

The community of former Matsugasaki-mura extends east-west along an old street located one block north between the Matsugasaki-bashi Nishi Iru (to the west of Matsugasaki-bashi) and the area surrounding the crossing with Takaragaike-dori Street.

The community of former Matsugasaki-mura extends east-west along an old street located one block north between the Matsugasaki-bashi Nishi Iru (to the west of Matsugasaki-bashi) and the area surrounding the crossing with Takaragaike-dori Street.

sen.j: 五山送り火の一つ妙法の麓である。
sen.e: The community is located at the foot of Myoho, one of the Five Mountains Send-off Bonfire.
The community is located at the foot of Myoho, one of the Five Mountains Send-off Bonfire.
The community is located at the foot of Myoho, one of the Five Mountains Send-off Bonfire.

sen.j: それ以外の地域は新興住宅地や田畑などがあり郊外の様相である。
sen.e: Other areas along the street are new residential areas or agricultural fields, having features of a suburb.
Other areas along the street are new residential areas or agricultural fields, which possess features of a suburb.
Other areas along the street are new residential areas or agricultural fields, which possess features of a suburb.

sen.j: 賀茂川以西は北に北山北通、北山北中通が、また南には北山南通が並行する。
sen.e: West of the Kamo-gawa River, the Kitayama-kita-dori Street and Kitayama-kita-naka-dori Street parallel in the north, and the Kitayama-minami-dori in the south.
West of the Kamo-gawa River, Kitayama-kita-dori Street and Kitayama-kita-naka-dori Street run parallel in the north, and parallel with Kitayama-minami-dori in the south.
West of the Kamo-gawa River, Kitayama-kita-dori Street and Kitayama-kita-naka-dori Street run parallel in the north, and parallel with Kitayama-minami-dori in the south.

sen.j: 上側が東側、下側が西側。
sen.e: East is upper and west is lower.
The upper side is considered the eastern portion, while the lower side is considered the western portion.

sen.j: 左側が北側、右側が南側。
sen.e: North is on the left and south is on the right.
